title: 推荐个1.12.2的BC端
author: 清壹色
txt_content:
适用于CatAServer核心的端就可以
优化一定要好。。
所有子服都是Catserver核心
不晓得用啥BC的核心
求大佬推荐个~

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content: 带有mod的跨服核心建议使用waterfall

replies.author: 清壹色
replies.txt_content:
恋 发表于 2020-3-1 01:35
带有mod的跨服核心建议使用waterfall
求链接呀！

replies.author: ljh221
replies.txt_content:
https://github.com/HexagonMC/BungeeCord/releases
这个是hexacord支持1.7-1.15.2支持cat mcpc caldron衍生mod端可能不支持spongeforge，sponge的话似乎要插件

replies.author: NothingnessVoid
replies.txt_content: https://papermc.io/ci/job/Waterfall/ 支持1.8-1.14如果有1.7的需要可以使用https://papermc.io/ci/job/Travertine/

replies.author: 利姆露酱
replies.txt_content:
ljh221 发表于 2020-3-1 03:01
https://github.com/HexagonMC/BungeeCord/releases
这个是hexacord支持1.7-1.15.2支持cat mcpc caldron衍 ...
hexacord 还不如 travertine

replies.author: 清壹色
replies.txt_content: 感谢各位！觉着waterfall比较好用耶。
